title: Behind bitcoin's big fall: Investors aren't willing to buy into the wild ride
description: Investors are staying on the sidelines as bitcoin remains a speculative "wild ride," says Tom Essaye of Sevens Report.
content:
Bitcoin's (BTC-USD) biggest problem isn't regulation or even volatility it's that most investors aren't ready to embrace the roller coaster.
"What we're seeing in crypto is that it's revealing itsel… [+3324 chars]
